19052.en:
Hey . If you keep this up, it's going to be dangerous and people will start screaming. Come on,
dance.
19052.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00300 _normal m00001>「……こら　<pc>。
　このままじゃ　あぶない空気になって
　みんな騒ぎだすぞ。はよ　踊るんじゃ。<stop_lip_animation n00300 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19052.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00300 _normal m00001>: ……예끼, <pc>.
　이대로 있다간 분위기가 썰렁해져서
　다들 들고일어날 거다. 어서 추거라.<stop_lip_animation n00300 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19052.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00300 _normal m00001>……喂，<pc>。
看看现场的气氛，
如果不跳舞观众会生气的。快跳吧！<stop_lip_animation n00300 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19052.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00300 _normal m00001>……喂，<pc>。
再不跳舞的話，氣氛會變險惡，
觀眾們會開始騷動的。快跳吧。<stop_lip_animation n00300 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19055.en:
The venue was filled with a peaceful
atmosphere.

19056.en:
<start_lip_sync n00324 _normal m00001>Yeah, it's good for killing time. It's
